attributes.action: Khatumo State of Somali leader should be invited to the London Somali Conference.
attributes.additional_details:
Khatumo State of Somali leader should be invited to the London Somali Conference 23 Feb.

The people of Sool, Sanaag and Cayn,SSC for short, have recently set up a local administration, called Khatumo State of Somalia, in their area.

Khatumo State of Somalia leaders represent the people of SSC and they need to be in the Somali Conference in London. They will never ever be represented by the Somaliland militia who are killing and prosecuting the SSC people in Bohdleh and Lasanod this week.

The people of SCC can't be represented by Somaliland or Puntland but their democratically elected leaders. For the conference to be fruitful Khatumo State leader should be in the conference.

All Somali groups should be present in the London meeting including Awdal State.

If the British government fails to invite Khatumo State of Somalia leader to the meeting it will indicate that they sided against the people of SSC.
